item.title: Makeover Monday 2022 Week 35 Power BI Tableau
item.description: Makeover Monday is a weekly project where participants can recreate a vizualization. The theme of week 35 is: Top 10 Countries in Military Spending. You can check the original version here. Good practices: Green color which is very much attached to the military aspect Use of flags to represent countries My version How did I developed? Result ![](link here) What I would like to show Links Make Over Monday 2022 Week 35 here.
